Review Text: The food was great, the atmosphere enjoyable, the waiters attentive (they kept our glasses full of wine), and the musicians fun.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Great resturant. High quality food, great value for money plus you get all the history for free!

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: One of the best meals in all my visits to Europe. Preparation and presentation of the food were perfect.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Best Duck and dessert ever! Cousy place with the nicest personnel and delicious food!!! Definitely coming back

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Highly recommend! lovely staff... our waitress was very very good, so good we left a huge tip for her. Food was amazing, We 3 ladies had a great night there. But the best thing was NO MUSIC! You could actually have a conversation, thoroughly enjoyed and will be back.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Typical Dutch restaurant walking distance from Rembrandtplein. Very lovely and helpful staff.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Very good food, attention was awesome, nice ambient. The size of the food are small

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: You can tell we‚Äôre British by the understatement. This is one of those restaurants that that has stood the test of time. We had charming, warm service. On a Monday night it wasn‚Äôt busy, but they were unobtrusively efficient. First course of ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Wonderful experience at this restaurant! A great welcome when we arrived and were looked after impeccably during the evening. The food was amazing - well presented and cooked beautifully. Would highly recommend this place.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Recommended to us by the staff at Banks Mansion. Friendly staff, sophisticated atmosphere, and decent prices, but the food! Wow! During our visit there was a "3 course surprise" on the menu. Myself and another member of our party tried it ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: My sisters were happy, the personnel works very hard, the food is ok. The table wasn't  exceptional (I reserved very, very late): next to the toilets with personnel running up and down all the time. Not bad all in all. Better reserve way ahead of time next time.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: When we arrived the restaurant was quiet but several tables had dirty dishes and glasses from long gone diners. No tap water available , have to purchase a bottle ... our waiters were polite and left us to our cocktails , fine salad, but ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluizer
Review Text:
Sluizer Restaurants is an excellent restaurant. The food was excellent and made with high quality products. We really enjoyed our diner for that reason.
The staff is professional and friendly. We only had an issue for the dessert as ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: This is a classic in Amsterdam, but upon every visit over the past 40 years always with excellent refined food and a wonderful service. Try it!

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Always a great choice for an intimate dinner with friends or a business appointment. The current menu also offers some delicious vegetarian options. Cosy atmosphere and friendly service which is unique to Amsterdam.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Excellent service and excellent food!

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: One of the best places we have eaten in Amsterdam. The mullet was perfect as was the red perch and next I will try the steak. The service was friendly, timely and English was excellent. If you have any doubts on which dessert,  I recommend ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Loved it here last spring. We could not find another place in the area that serves such great food AND does it until the very closing. Ended up going here 2 night out of 4 we had in Amsterdam and are recalling it with warmth to this day. I highly recommend it!

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: The food served here was the best we have ever had .If you are a seafood lover it's a must to dine here whilst you are visiting Amsterdam.We had scallop to start followed by cod .The staff have so much passion for what they are serving.Was ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Great place at the south-centre area of the city. Nice interior and nicer staff. The menu is fully of ttaditional dishes with several meats (duck, veal, beef...) and fishes (seabass, cod...), From the starters the pate is remarkable. Also they have a good wine list.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: I have mixed feelings about this place.  The meal itself (Chef's Surprise--fish) was quite good (not the best I've had) and the service was also really good.  I can't really fault either.  The problems came at the end.  We ordered two ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Nice formal restaurant, limited but varied menu, wines expensive but decent. Friendly staff who told us how happy the residents of Amsterdam were just to live there (though I suspect it's the passive smoking of the wacky baccy!). Great night, the Americans there weren't too loud or crass.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Really good food and a friendly service. We were recommended to go here by a local who eats here. We walked in off the street and were accommodated. I will be back in Amsterdam next year and I will definitely go back to Sluizer for another meal. The price is good for very good quality food.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Amazing food and very friendly staff. Do try their "surprise" menu, 3 courses 29 Euros per     person. Their ingredients are sourced locally and  the standard of the food would be hard to beat in a Michelin star restaurant.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Fantastic local restaurant in the Canal Ring. Gracious hospitality from start to finish - beautiful food treated well - casual but attentive. Highly recommend if you are travelling to Amsterdam - go here.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: The restaurant is fantastic, the owner is very kind. The food is fantastica. Next time in Amsterdam I Will surely come back! Thanks for the perfect dinner.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere, fantastic food, even better wine.  We both really enjoyed the meal. The staff were lovely and very attentive.  Would definitely go back if we visit Amsterdam again

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: Surf and turf options all around. Had the braised cod and the sirloin steak both cooked to perfection. For sides we tried the white asparagus and mushrooms, also both splendid. Would have like some additional salad options, but overall great dinner out.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: My wife and I came here by accident and loved the atmosphere, food and discreet high-end service. This restaurant can hold its own against the best Amsterdam has to offer.

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: I‚Äôve eaten in many restaurants in Amsterdam and Holland.  This one had the best food, a quiet and relaxed atmosphere, and friendly service.   Prices were fair for the quality. Enjoy!

Name: Sluizer
Review Text: I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place. The food is mediocre and flavorless. Slow service.
